text: Erik Tandberg (August 28, 1913 - January 22, 1964 in Oslo) was a Norwegian bobsledder who competed in the early 1950s. At the 1952 Winter Olympics in Oslo, he finished 14th in the two-man event. ==References== ==External links== *1952 bobsleigh two-man results Category:Bobsledders at the 1952 Winter Olympics Category:Norwegian male bobsledders Category:1964 deaths Category:1913 births
title: Erik Tandberg
